room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: This was a total blast! We went last night and completed the Hunted room with seven minutes to spare. We had the best time and cannot wait to go back and do more rooms! I would definitely recommend the Hunted Cabin room it was very well put together and was surprising you all the way to the end of how everything went together.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: Had a great time. Played "The Hunted" game. The staff was friendly. Really looking forward to trying out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: We had so much fun last night! Our group had a big age range and everyone had a blast! Cant wait to go back and try the other rooms! We barely escaped the hunted with 27 seconds left!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: We had an absolute blast doing The Hunted escape room! The staff was super friendly and this is a great way to spend some time with friends and work together! Everything was so well thought out! I can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
review: My wife and I went for our anniversary with a couple friends. We did the hunted cabin and it was a very fun time! It was super hard and we barely made it out with 3min to spare! We will definitely be back for another room!
